GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article matching the id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows incrementing of a specified articles votes, serves the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows adding of a new comment, serves the added comment
